Title: January 2023
Content: *p71949ra0520*turn over    5  (ii) the student used a stopwatch to determine t for different values of m.   devise a plan to test the validity of the relationship between t 2 and m.  the method should use a suitable graph.(6)(b)the student suggested that using a video recording of the motion would improve the determination of t.comment on this suggestion.(2)(total for question 2 = 10 marks)
